comment: I absolutely loved Professor Taylor, her class is so engaging and when it comes to helping you find interships and connecting with professionals she is MUCH better than the career center. Please, take her if you want to learn in the funnest way possible.

Professor Taylor has a lot of experience and is very caring and wants her students to succeed. The class is a high-level overview of different technology infrastructure aspects. There are several guest speakers who delve deeper into the topics. The lectures are straight to the point and then there are a few writing assignments and quizzes.

Speaking for her online 3040 class. Its super easy. she gives out a simple writing assignment at random(by random i mean some weeks she doesn't give out any assignments but post a lecture powerpoint.) and gives u the whole week to do it. Its simple writing that is usually 1 paragraph or 2 and is based off the lecture powerpoint. 2 10Q quizzes .
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things--Online Savvy
